sections.heading: DELIVERYArt. 2684. Obligations to deliver the thing at the agreed time and in good conditionThe lessor is bound to deliver the thing at the agreed time and in good condition suitable for the purpose for which it was leased
sections.text: Acts 2004, No. 821, ยง1, eff. Jan. 1, 2005.
